title: Ready to view now! Visit The Covington Apartments today!
posting_body: ['Come home to a great community - The Covington Apartments!', 'Address:', '5800 American Blvd W', 'Bloomington, MN 55437', 'Beds:', '1  /', 'Baths:', '1 /', 'Size:', '824 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent:', '$1750', 'The Covington is in a great location near popular attractions and with easy access to I-494, Hwy 5 & public transportation.', "We're just 13 miles south of Minneapolis and 22 miles southwest of St. Paul.", "Take a ten-minute stroll and you'll be at the Normandale Lake Bandshell, which holds fun outdoor concerts and events.", "If you're more into cultural activities, check out the nearby Bloomington Center for the Arts where you'll find theaters, art galleries, art classrooms and more.", 'Like the water?', 'Bush Lake Beach is the perfect spot for canoeing, swimming, exploring trails or just laying out on the sand.', 'Security Deposit:', 'Call', 'Length of Lease:', '9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month', 'show contact info', 'Property Features:', '✓ Conference Room', '✓ Disposal Chutes', '✓ Elevator', '✓ Fire Pits', '✓ Online Payments', '✓ Pond', '✓ Recycling', '✓ Rooftop Lounge', '✓ Sundeck', '✓ Weight Machines', '✓ Fitness Programs/Classes', '✓ Kingsley Excellence Award', '✓ Maintenance on Site', '✓ Massages Offered', '✓ Pet Washing Station', '✓ Planned Social Activities', '✓ Video Surveillance/Patrol', '✓ Wake Up With Weidner Continental Breakfast', '✓ Welcoming Lobby Areas', '✓ Yoga Classes Offered', 'Apartment Amenities:', '✓ Garbage Disposal', '✓ Kitchen Island', '✓ Maple Cabinetry', '✓ Microwave', '✓ Plank Flooring', '✓ Sliding Glass Doors', '✓ Sprinkler System', '✓ Stainless Steel Energy Efficient Appliances', '✓ Storage Space', '✓ Walk-In Closets', 'Pets:', 'Pet Friendly - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $300.00, Rent $40.00, Deposit $200.00, Breed Restrictions Apply.', 'Business Hours:', 'Mon - Thu: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Fri - Sat: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Ready to Lease?', 'Call our office at', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Proudly managed by Weidner Apartment Homes, LLC', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'AC050A458D6D45C']
